name: df-hfmul
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(chft, cmpo(s0, s1, cc, co(cc, cmap, chba), cmpt(s2, chba, co(cv(s0), cmul, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
